amendment.description: To permit the establishment of 2 new Medigap plans for Medicare beneficiaries enrolled for prescription drug coverage under part D.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1066 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 258.

action.text: Amendment SA 1066 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8502-8506; text: CR S8502) To permit the establishment of 2 new Medigap plans for Medicare beneficiaries enrolled for prescription drug coverage under part D.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1066 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 258.
